Package gameObject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Description:
    Contains the controllers of the gaming system
    Creates players, describes explosions, renders graphics etc.
    GameObject
    Description:
    GameObject class is extended by most game objects
    MovableObject
    Description:
    Overall MoveableObject that extends GameObject
    Utilizes methods that determines whether an object is capable of moving across a certain region
    Denotes the length and direction of an object's movement
    Point
    Description:
    Defines point on grid map
    SpriteSheet
    Description:
    Defines SpriteSheet from image file
    Utilizes regions of image bounded by specific coordinates
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameObject.ORIENTATION  
    MovableObject.ANIMATION  
    MovableObject.FACING
